name: D/D/D Chaos King Apocalypse
effectText: During your opponent's turn, if this card is in your hand or GY (Quick Effect): You can target 2 face-up Spells/Traps you control; you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Fiend monsters, also destroy the targeted cards, and if you do, Special Summon this card. You can only use this effect of "D/D/D Chaos King Apocalypse" once per turn.
pendEffect: You can banish 2 "D/D" monsters from your GY; Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone.
